articles.author: Sian Cain
articles.title: Mira Sorvino 'hurt and shocked' after Oscars omits her father from in memoriam segment - The Guardian
articles.description: Academy Award-winning actor says ‘it is baffling beyond belief’ that Paul Sorvino was excluded along with several others
articles.content:
Actor Mira Sorvino has said she is incredibly hurt and shocked after her father, the late actor Paul Sorvino, was omitted from the Oscars in memoriam segment on Sunday night.
